document.full_text: communist party officials this weekend abruptly canceled a debate competition among students from 16 universities on the topic of china's 1911 revolution, one official said.
document.title: china detains worshipers over praying in public
lines_and_colors: communist party officials this weekend abruptly canceled a debate competition among students from 16 universities on the topic of china's 1911 revolution, one official said.
